title: Ring of Fire - October 05 2013
description:
This week on Ring of Fire Radio: 

October 05, 2013
Ring of Fire 
Hosted by Robert F. Kennedy Jr., Mike Papantonio and Sam Seder



Hour 1: Discuss news stories ignored by Corporate controlled media & the government shutdown.



Hour 2: RL Miller, chair of California Democratic PartyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Environmental Caucus, will tell us about the fight to put an end to dangerous fracking activities in California. And climate scientist and author Michael Mann will join us to discuss the new IPCC report, and weÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll find out what it means for the future of the planet.



Hour 3: And America Blog contributing editor Gaius Publius will tell us why the cleanup of the Fukushima nuclear power plant could be an environmental disaster. And author/journalist David Sirota will tell us how state governments are looting public pension funds.
